snippet.title: Crazy Penguin Catapult - iPhone Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Crazy Penguin Catapult

http://goo.gl/zwLDg

Category: "Games", "Entertainment", "Action", "Arcade"

****************************************************************************
Subscribe to get DAILY UPDATES with games released on the iOs

Appstore Description:

Join Digital Chocolate in our celebration of our 100 millionth download! We want to mark this amazing moment by offering two favorite games for FREE, for a limited time only! All 3 maps from this game are now available to download at no cost to you. Be quick, Digital Chocolate's crazy generosity can't last forever! Make the most of this mad double offer and download Crazy Penguin Catapult and 3D Rollercoaster Rush New York now!

Award Winning and Most Anticipated Game! Get 2 games in 1: Launch over 200 penguins in Campaign Mode or play endless matches in Strategy Mode.

-----------------------------------------
GAME REVIEW
IGN scores 8/10 and says "I think any casual gamer will get a lot of smiles from it. The turn-based strategy game is a cool extra that helps make Crazy Penguin Catapult well worth the price."
-----------------------------------------

Fend off invading Polar Bears by hurtling courageous penguins at them with your trusty catapult! Triumph in boss battles and unlock crazy penguin power-ups including Ninja, Fire, The Twins and more! Get an additional Strategy game that lets you command armies of penguins to attack and capture enemy polar bear territories. Didn't get a perfect score? Retry levels to get the highest score possible with endless replay value! Watch your score bubble up as you are racing to break ice blocks and knock over polar bears.

FULL VERSION FEATURES:
• Two great game games in one:
(1) Campaign Mode: Original and charming story with over 200 penguins to launch
(2) Strategy Mode: Take over enemy bear territories in a turn-based struggle for domination
• Unlock 9 clever power-ups
• Explore 3 unique maps
• Great controls - gently slide or tap your fingers on the touch screen to move your penguin on the map
• Use the accelerometer when launching the penguins by doing a quick flick with your device
• Check your progress in real time with High Scores
• Bright and polished graphics creating a vibrant Antarctic environment
• Excellent music and sound effects

MORE FUN ON APPLE APP STORE
Check out DChoc's hottest games: Crazy Penguin Assault, 3D Rollercoaster Rush, 3D Mini Golf Challenge, Tower Bloxx Deluxe 3D, 3D Brick Breaker Revolution and Millionaire City.

FIND DC ON THE WEB
Get updated with Digital Chocolate's latest product, promos and game tips! Visit us on Facebook, MySpace, YouTube and Twitter! Find us FAST by searching for dchoc.

All trademarks referenced herein are the property of their respective owners.
